text: greetings my name is Matt Wood and I'm
here at the AWS headquarters in Seattle
to announce the general availability of
the Amazon elastic file system Amazon
EFS is designed to be the simplest way
to provide file storage to thousands of
ec2 instances home directories big data
analytics video processing web serving
and content management can now benefit
from a distributed file system that
delivers high throughput and
consistently low latency even when it's
scales into the petabytes Amazon EFS
provides file system access semantics so
your existing applications can continue
to work smoothly and scales up and down
as you use it so you only pay for what
you use no more crystal ball predictions
wasted upfront Capital expenses or worst
of all unpleasant surprises this service
also rounds out the Amazon storage
platform customers can choose between
object storage with Amazon S3 block
storage with Amazon EBS and now file
storage with EFS with numerous ways to
bring data in as batches trickles or
streams Amazon EFS is included in the
AWS free tier so you can get started
today with up to 5 gig of storage right
away thanks a lot
